issue.title: [Rust] Implement support for Decimal with 256 bits of precision.
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10602](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10602). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The specification now supports it and there are basic implementations in C++/Java

comments.body:
